## Mission

The mission of the SMART program is to provide undergradute students with the opportunity to conduct a statistical project under the supervision of graduate students from UC Riverside's Statistics Department.

## Goals

- Provide undergraduate students the opportunity to conduct statistical projects.
- Provide graduate students with the opportunity to mentor students.
- Provide graduate students with the opportunity to develop a project.
